name: Run By Daylight
description:
Run by daylight is a runner made by 2 students in 4 days. Make it to the end of the level before you get caught by the light.

Controls

A/Left arrow: Move 1 lane left

D/Right arrow: Move 1 lane right

W/Up arrow/Spacebar: Jump

S/Down arrow: Move down from jump

DP & Programming & (most) Visual Arts:

- Coko (Matthijs)

- Maerc (Marc)

Special thanks to:

- Megana: Candle.obj
